title: Did the U.S. Navy fire on an Iranian passenger plane in 1988, killing 290 civilians?
subtitle: The United States of America dropped Iran's flight 655, killing all 290 civilians on board in one of the worst maritime accidents in the history of the United States.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: In 1988, the United States Navy shot down an Iranian passenger aircraft, killing 290 civilians; some crew members who shot down the plane were later given medals, and the United States did not formally apologize for the event.
